description: The Man Raising Hand, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the  Happy Person Raising One Hand,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2, ? Male S
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man raising hand emoji with light skin tone conveys enthusiastic participation with a bright, friendly demeanor. His arm is raised high, elbow bent slightly, with an open palm signaling a clear, eager response.  Apple's signature smooth gradients and subtle 3D shading give his skin a natural, healthy tone, while the soft rounded edges of his form make him approachable and inviting in digital conversations.
